name: Ancestors (itch) (alice liu, LettuceWrychu, LunarMunkey, Shunpai, amie trang, VoidLotus, Jingen, JohnGreska, luoxyz, Sul_iac, yeju, tliang3612)
name_original: Ancestors (itch) (alice liu, LettuceWrychu, LunarMunkey, Shunpai, amie trang, VoidLotus, Jingen, JohnGreska, luoxyz, Sul_iac, yeju, tliang3612)
description:
A game created by members of the BobaTalks organization, for Global Game Jam 2023. Made for 1920x1080 display.


Meet the Team DEVELOPMENT

Ted  - Programmer (haidoumo)

Anna Biernacki  - Technical UI Designer (LunarMunkey)

CREATIVE

Alice Liu  - Creative Director, Character Concept Art, Character Art & Animation (aliceliu)

Amie Trang  - UI & Visual Design, Environment/Prop Art & Animation (amietrang)

Ye Ju Kim  - Character Art & Animation (yeju)

GAME DESIGN

Adam Ngo  - Game Design (Jingen)

Ricky Torres Gonzalez  - Game Design (rickytg)

Wrai - Game Design (MinatoAkito)

Z  - Narrative Design (torrent)

AUDIO

John Greska - Sound (JohnGreska)

Suliac - Music (Suli_ac)

ORGANIZATION

Alex Lee - Group Facilitator (VoidLotus)
